name: That's Not A Pixel
description:
That's Not A Pixel is a simple game.

Get the pixels.
Avoid other pixels
Make sure your colors match

This is a game jam game that will be expanded upon as time progresses! Lots of feedback welcomed! More feedback/support means more development for the game.

Feedback can be sent to notapixel@origaminc.com.

For more information on why this game exist, and the plans for That's Not A Pixel, read this.
